channel.title: 508 npc help(adding multiple animations HELP MEEE
channel.description:
Ok so i figured out how to add the animations to an npc such as "karil" from barrows. i need to add more than one animation to the npc.
if(n.npcType == 2028) <<karil { n.requestAnim(2075,0); <<shoots bow n.requestGFX(28,0); << crossbow bolt }
i want it to where karil raises the bow, has the correct stance, and dies the correct way. but when i add the extra anim it shows an error or just does on of the others, so help would be appreciated. This also goes with all of the other barrows members. just using karil as an example. ;D
i try something like this f(n.npcType == 2028) <<karil { n.requestAnim(2075,0); <<shoots bow n.requestAnim(2074,0); << holding bow n.requestGFX(28,0); << crossbow bolt } but all it does is just hold the bow and not shoot it. Get what i mean?

item.title: 508 npc help(adding multiple animations HELP MEEE
item.dc:creator: @flamehair9 flamehair9
item.description:
@flamehair9 wrote:

Ok so i figured out how to add the animations to an npc such as “karil” from barrows. i need to add more than one animation to the npc.

if(n.npcType == 2028) <<karil
{
n.requestAnim(2075,0); <<shoots bow
n.requestGFX(28,0); << crossbow bolt
}

i want it to where karil raises the bow, has the correct stance, and dies the correct way. but when i add the extra anim it shows an error or just does on of the others, so help would be appreciated. This also goes with all of the other barrows members. just using karil as an example. ;D

i try something like this
f(n.npcType == 2028) <<karil
{
n.requestAnim(2075,0); <<shoots bow
n.requestAnim(2074,0); << holding bow
n.requestGFX(28,0); << crossbow bolt
}
but all it does is just hold the bow and not shoot it. Get what i mean?

Read full topic
item.source: 508 npc help(adding multiple animations HELP MEEE
